text: Julio Alberto González Bascuñán (born 11 June 1978Julio Bascuñán González) is a Chilean football referee. He refereed the 2015 and 2016 Copa América. In 2018 he joined the number of arbitrators to serve the matches of the final stage of the 2018 World Cup in Russia. ==References== Category:1978 births Category:Living people Category:Chilean football referees Category:Copa América referees Category:People from Santiago Category:2018 FIFA World Cup referees
title: Julio Bascuñán
